main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Caja Marca, Peru on multiple occasions, with a distinct white-steel color, erratic movements, and varying visibility.
interesting points: The object was reported on three separate days: October 26, October 29, and November 8, 1957., The object appeared to move at varying speeds, sometimes climbing or descending., Witnesses described it as gleaming and spherical in shape., Observations included specific azimuth and elevation angles recorded during sightings., The object was concluded to be probably astronomical based on the report.
witness description: non-commissioned officers of the U.S. Air Force
